sentences.en: An emaciated cat quickly dropped from the ladder, watched something under vanilla jar, kept yelling out rudely, but Xiamen zoological garden people may not inquire what happened.
sentences.cn: 一只衰弱的大猫刷一声从梯子上摔下来，盯着有香草味的罐子并粗鲁地叫着，可厦门动物园的工作员对此置之不理！

sentences.en: Many kinds of animals are kept for exhibition in zoological gardens.
sentences.cn: 动物园里喂着许多种供展出的动物.

sentences.en: On the wagon was a Nubian lion from the royal zoological gardens.
sentences.cn: 车上是皇家动物园的一头努比亚种的狮子.

sentences.en: The birds were put on display at the zoological society.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟类将在动物协会展出.

sentences.en: The last one is the Zoological section.
The official periodical of the International Commission on Zoological Nomenclature.
sentences.cn: 国际动物命名法委员会的正式刊物.

sentences.en: This is probably the biggest zoological discovery of the century.
sentences.cn: 这可能是本世纪生物学上最重大的发现.

sentences.en: This nation, famous for its unique fauna and flora, is now allowing applications for the professional export of its protected species to overseas zoological gardens.
sentences.cn: 该国以出产独特动物群和植物群闻名，如今开放专业申请将其保育类动物出口到海外的动物园去。
